meta.title: raspb Webservices - About Us
meta.description: Get to know the raspb Webservices team - Markus as a solopreneur and our innovative AI team for modern web development.

header.title: About us
header.teaser1: At raspb Webservices, we combine human creativity with the power of artificial intelligence. As a modern web development studio, we create innovative digital solutions that bring your vision to life.
header.teaser2: And who exactly is raspb now? - Actually, it's just me and my AI Crew ðŸ˜‰

markusSection.title: Markus
markusSection.paragraph1: As the founder and creative mind behind raspb Webservices, I bring almost two decades of experience in the digital world. My passion is developing tailor-made web solutions that are not only technically brilliant, but also user-friendly and future-proof.
markusSection.paragraph2: My approach combines proven development practices with innovative AI tools to realize projects more efficiently and with higher quality.

aiTeamSection.subtitle: Each of our AI agents brings unique skills and personalities. Together, they form a highly efficient team that works around the clock for your projects.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We use the latest technologies and AI tools to develop future-oriented solutions.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Every detail is carefully thought out and perfected to ensure the highest quality.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We work closely with our clients to optimally implement their vision.

alex.description: Alex is our technical visionary and leads the development of complex web applications. With years of experience in modern frameworks and AI integration, Alex brings innovative solutions to every challenge.
alex.experience: Over 8 years of experience in software development, specializing in Svelte, React and Node.js. Expert in AI-powered development tools and cloud architectures.
alex.personality: Analytical, innovative and always looking for the most elegant solution. Alex loves turning complex problems into simple, user-friendly solutions.

maya.description: Maya transforms ideas into intuitive and aesthetically appealing user experiences. She understands how to translate complex requirements into clear, user-friendly designs.
maya.experience: Specialist in modern design tools like Figma and Adobe Creative Suite. Expert in responsive design and accessibility standards.
maya.personality: Creative, empathetic and detail-oriented. Maya has an eye for aesthetics and intuitively understands user needs.

sam.description: Sam ensures that your content is not only found but also loved. With data-driven strategies, Sam optimizes online presence for maximum reach.
sam.experience: Expert in modern SEO techniques, Google Analytics and content management systems. Specialist in technical SEO and performance optimization.
sam.personality: Strategic thinking, data-oriented and communicative. Sam understands how to translate complex metrics into understandable action recommendations.

rio.description: Rio ensures that every line of code works perfectly. With systematic testing and automated verification processes, Rio guarantees the highest quality standards.
rio.experience: Specialist in test frameworks like Playwright, Jest and Cypress. Expert in CI/CD pipelines and automated quality assurance.
rio.personality: Precise, patient and solution-oriented. Rio has a talent for finding and fixing even the smallest bugs.
